title: PIxel 3a no longer shows up in Windows
content:
I've had the 3a for about 10 months now. I routinely back up my photos to my computer via USB, selecting 'File transfer/Android Auto' on the phone.
This stopped working about a month ago. The computer beeps as if it's seeing something but calls it 'unknown'. The phone settings are all correct. No window opens for the phone, nothing happens except for a computer beep.
How do I get file transfer back?
Thx,
Ed

Pixel 3a with Android 10, now 11, up to date.
Windows 10 build 2004, up to date.
